title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9850.12 - Examination of record after hearing
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 9850.12 - Examination of record after hearing

State Regulations

The record and transcript of the hearing and the memoranda of
law or other post-hearing submissions of the parties may be examined by any
party to the hearing at the Office of Administrative Hearings during regular
business hours. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
9850.12

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
